column5: Hey guys,  I'm looking for a place where i can buy some new pill containers or whatever you want to call them , clear film canisters.  Looking for cylindrical, up to maybe 5 inches height.  I want to put my inline spinners in individual containers so I can just grab and go, and I realize old film canister and prescription pill containers work awesome...but in looking for clear.  Please let me know ideas Guys
Go to your local pharmacist. Tell him what you want the containers for, and see if he can either give you a source, or if he can order in a case for you
These work for size 0-2, after that they're too small.  Ugli, maybe I'll have to ask a local pharmacist if he can hook me up......I thought it would be easy to find anywhere, guess not...
This is going to sound bad but methadone clinics. I pitch garbage and every week they have bags of bottles.
I used to get mine from Blacks
Lol I'm looking for new, unused....suppose I could go to a sperm donor clinic and tell them I'll be working from home....  Paul are they clear canisters from blacks, or black.......
I know Lee Valley carries these which may fit the bill in the larger 4" sizes.  http://www.leevalley.com/en/wood/page.aspx?p=32173&cat=1,43326  Cheers, Mark
That's perfect, now only if I could find them locally so I can fit up my sizes lol...but that's it
Hey Buick14  PM me with your loction. I work for a company that distributes the containers you are looking for.
Dollarama , you can get clear plastic or glass salt shakers , that'll do the trick .
they had both, they would hand me a garbage bag full. They put them out for recycling
